column1: The crew believes that they mermaids in the night, but Ahab says that there were actually ___
What experience catalyzed Pip and Ahab's close companionship?
When Ahab insists on climbing the mast to be the first to see Moby Dick, what happens to his hat?
When Ahab and Starbuck talk about their families, how does Ahab see himself on his relentless quest?
What does the Delight drop into the water as the Pequod passes by?
